LanguageData.CMS_Settings_Description: Select the default map size for new games. Does not affect existing save files.
LanguageData.CMS_IsNotDefault: Not default — click to make this the default
LanguageData.CMS_NotDefaultTip: Current selection differs from your saved default. Click to make this the default for future colonies.
LanguageData.CMS_AlreadyDefaultTip: This is already your saved default.
LanguageData.CMS_PerfNote: Note: Very large maps can impact performance.
